title: Clinical Instructional Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic clinical education experience and intermediate-level patient care knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment-based education for practicing medical professionals.

learning_goals: Participants can design educational scenarios applying the clinical instruction model (Proctor model) with 80% accuracy.
Participants can improve achievement of learning objectives by over 70% during practical instruction using feedback-based teaching methods.
Participants can enhance instructional efficiency through digital tools (smartphone-based apps) in blended learning environments by over 60%.

resources: Projector and Basic Audio Recording Equipment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
